channel.title: Question
channel.description:
How can I get MoparScape to work if Java is stored in My Documents? Because I cant get access to My Program files.
[code]@echo off title Running Bot java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup pause[/code]
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2007, 12:35:24 PM[/size][hr]
Well, I kinda got it now.. I run moparscape it starts up, then it closes.
[code]@echo off title Running Bot "C:\Documents and Settings\cooperlab\My Documents\Mopar\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup pause[/code]

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

If you gonna install, you get an option where to save, click browse and click on desktop. Then install and it’ll be saved on the desktop,and then run. If it doesn’t run still. Then download the newest java, (I got JDK 6.0)

Read full topic
